choices: Look up for on a book about fungus to find any smelly fungi...
Look up a book about flowers, to see if there are any stinky flowers...
Go to lunch, continue your research and studies later...
Someone wants to visit you...
The Magic academy is also throwing a cantrip party!
1.content:
This story starts in a classroom of a huge magical academy with a goblin girl alone in the classroom studying something....

Her name is Citrine, named after a gemstone for her yellow-orange eyes...

She looked like a young girl, except with pointy goblin ears and her green skin, but also even though she's a goblin she speaks intelligently like a human...

Even for a goblin she had long auburn hair that reached her waist and her outfit were robes with and outer and inner layer of clothing, the outer layer of her robes are lavender with purple trim and a Tsavorite gemstone on the chest, the inner layer is a light-beige dress with a high mandarin neck collar...

Despite that she was a goblin, she's a prodigious high ranking Senior student and the head of her class...



Right now Citrine the goblin is in the classroom reading some books and working on some research of hers... Something called "Smell magic" or what she would like to call "Stink Magic" a kind of magic based off of various odors and smells... And it seems that she's enjoying pretty well as she practiced it...

The lunch bell rings! Time for lunch!
1.title: The goblin girl alone in the classroom...

choices: Create a potion to increase my magic and stinks tenfold!
Summon a smelly demon minion!
Create my own stinkmage staff!
Transform into a smelly beast!
11.content:
Citrine was so overcome with the passage about the smelly fungus that she didn't even notice that the bell had rung! She didn't care either, Citrine was so beyond this magical training thing. She had been learning magic for a year and was something of a prodigy, and once she learned about the only kind of magic she liked (stink magic!) she could care less about any other kind.

Citrine had also become somewhat of a rebel lately, cutting classes and using magically enhanced farts to torture her peers. The little goblin was on her last lifeline with the magical dean, so she decided she was gonna get out before she got thrown out. That's the reason she was in the library, so she could take what really mattered when she left: books!

She had loaded up her backpack with her favorite books about stinks and now she was fleeing school! It was easier than you'd think: the guards were notoriously lazy and Citrine was able to easily sneak past them while they slept. The smelly little goblin ran out into the enchanted woods and kept running until she couldn't see the woods on the horizon. Tired and sweaty, she sat down on a stump and emptied out her backpack.

"Let's see, a bag of trail mix, some stinky regents, and magical encyclopedias including The magic of BO, Smelly plants, fungi and minerals for potions, summoning and other magical uses!, The magical, stinking gases inside YOU, and of course my favorite: The Raunchy Monster's Compendium! Now, to start on my quest for some 'Devil's Toe Fungus' so I can..."
11.title: The start of a gross adventure!

choices: Smelly little farting fairies
Mischievous (And smelly) satyr girls
AWFUL smelling Rafflesia plant girls!
112.content:
That's right, demon summoning! But not just any demon, oh no. The soon-to-be famous Stink Mage Citrine wanted a familiar from the furthest reaches of stink hell. She had read about it in her books: A place where mortals with weak noses were sent and tortured for all eternity with horrible smells beyond imagination. So what better place to go to get her familiar: A faithful minion that would serve Citrine in her pursuit of putrid power.

And with the magic of summoning circles Citrine wouldn't even have to sacrifice her nose to get a demon from stink hell! She already had most of the ingredient in her pack, the only thing left was to get some Devil's Toe Fungus from these woods. And that shouldn't be too hard.

Pretty soon Citrine would have her own stink-demon minion that she could use to amplify her spells and her smells, the power of a demon would make her strong enough to rule the school with her mighty stink magic.

"Yes! And those dumb kids will rue the day they called my stink magic "stupid" or "immature"! They'll see!" Citrine shouted to no one in particular, "They'll see when I stink them so bad their noses run away crying! They'll kiss my smelly feet just to make it stop!"

Eventually Citrine stopped ranting(eventually) and decided she would head onward. The only thing she had to worry about in the glade that the Devil's Toe grew was the local fauna, most notably...
112.title: Citrine wants a proper familiar!

choices: Turned the ground beneath her to foul smelling mud!
Dropped a load of magically conjured dragon crap on her!
Squirted her with skunk musk!
1121.content:
When Citrine set foot in the glade she stirred up a cloud of glittery dust from the ground below. Almost instantly the air became filled with buzzing and the faint tinkling of bells. Citrine was experienced enough in the magical world to know that the sound in the air could only be one thing: Fairies.

If there was one thing that Citrine hated it was fairies; they're mischievious, magical, and they all practiced stink magic! Normally they used pleasing scents to delight other magickin, but they also knew more than a few foul smelling spells. Worst of all? They all looked alike! Dumb blond hair, glowing auras, and dumb dresses made of leaves, gossamer and dewdrops.

She hated them, and quickly picked up a stick to waive them away while she was looking for the fungus. Bright little lights twinkled around them, giggling and flicking sparkles at them.

"Get away you nasty nyphms! Filthy things"

The immediately became displeased with her, letting out "stinking toots"(a low level stink spell). They were pretty easy to ignore, but annoying. She continued searching the glade until-

"Aha!" Citrine said, "there it is!"

Just over the side of a log nearby was ths fungus! She could almost touch it! Citrine made to move closer, but suddenly found herself tied to the grass by her shoelaces with some enchanced teathers.

"Fairies..." Citirne grumbled. True to her word, the swarm of fairies surrounded her, no longer content with farting on her. Thy started to glow, preparing a magical spell by combining their magic. In a flash of light they...
1121.title: That ain't pixie dust!

choices: Ask the fairies to teach her.
Go under to learn the spell herself.
11211.content:
Citrine expected just a mud pit...but she soon hears bubbling under her...and she starts sinking. Upon looking down, the goblin is surprised at what she saw...yet was fascinated as well.

"Quicksand!"

Creating quicksand took a high amount of skill with the geomancy school. But this particular quicksand was VERY stinky. These fairies were very skilled in both stink magic and geomancy. Citrine soon realized that these fairies knew the rare but powerful "Swamp Sinkhole" spell. Due to her small stature, the hobgoblin is soon up to her chin in the quicksand. As for what Citrine would do now, she had to decide if she wanted to ask the fairies to teach her the spell or to try learning it herself by going under. What will she do?
11211.title: A Sinking Feeling!

choices: ...that the fungus disappeared!
...that the fairies were mounting a second attack!
11213.content:
A faint golden shimmer rippled across the grass and foliage around her feet, and then disappeared as quickly as it came. Citrine glanced downwards to see all the flowers around her shedding their petals. The fairies retreated away from her with their obnoxious giggles as the flowers began to bloom miniature skunk tails. They'd conjured skunk blossoms! She should've known what those fairies were up to. A thick, musky stink wafted from the flowers up to Citrine's nose as she struggled with all her might to pull her feet from the magical tethers, but it was no use!

The flowers began to menacingly lean in her direction. Citrine looked up pleadingly at the fairy ringleader, who met her gaze with a saucy wink while mockingly pinching her nose. Citrine whine of despair was met with a chorus of wet squeaks and a hot, pungent mist that soaked her from every angle. Her hair stiffened, her eyes watered, and she violently gagged from the skunk blossoms' exhaust, which her text described as a potent chemical with a stench like a dozen bloated skunks' rumps after a strict diet of blackberries. "Gassy skunks were a pretty apt description," thought Citrine, who (in between heaves) detected a current of eggy flatulence in the mix.

As the yellowish mist cleared, Citrine peered out to see...
11213.title: Squirted her with skunk musk!

choices: They continue to stink up Essa's things
Mercy! They let her go
1122.content:
Citrine headed out to the glade in search of the Devil's Toe Fungus, said to grow particularly in tree hollows. With her luck, and the amount of rotting trees in the glade, she could be in and out in no time.

Two hours later, Citrine was exhausted from checking various trees' nooks and crannies, but to no avail. It was as if someone had picked them all off! Frustrated (and lost), Citrine began to stumble around the glade recklessly, not retracing her steps back home, but going deeper into the glade. All she could think about was getting that fungus. She'd spend the whole night here if she had to. She didn't care, or at least not yet.

Then, it appeared to her from afar. A thick corridor of bushes lead to a tree with an open hollow, and she could see from afar the unmistakable notch of the Devil's Toe Fungus. Citrine made a dead sprint to the tree, but her dash was interrupted when she felt her foot get caught. The trap swung her foot up and pulled the goblin nearly 4 feet off the ground as she screamed in surprise. Hanging upside down with her prize so close, she heard some giggles from behind her.

"That was the fastest one yet! I didn't think you'd get her."
"New record?"
"New record."

A couple of satyr girls then crossed in front of her and eyed her up and down. Citrine could already smell the heavy, musky scent of their bodies wafting around. "See if she's got anything good in that bag." The blonde satyr took Citrine's bag off of her and began rummaging through it. "Hey Izzy!" she called.

"What?" asked the brunette satyr.

"We got ourselves a stinkmage!" she laughed, as Citrine's fear turned to anger upon seeing the satyr get her grubby hands on her spellbook. The other satyr gave an exaggerated gasp and began to jokingly cower from the immobilized goblin. "Have mercy on us, oh pungent one, we know not what we do," she cackled. "That's why she wants the fungus, you know," Izzy muttered, while her friend looked to the sky in thought. "Essa?" The brunette turned back to Izzy with a grin that couldn't bode well for Citrine.

"Let's 'enchant' some of her things," murmured Essa as she took off Citrine's robe. Izzy laughed and joined in, stripping Citrine's shoes off as well. Citrine was about to protest until Essa leaned over and planted Citrine's nose in her wet tuft of her armpit hair. Essa's ripe B.O. came from months of disregarding the satyr taboo of bathing, and it disabled Citrine nearly instantly. "You wanna smell like me?" Essa inquired, while balling up Citrine's robe. She let Citrine's face fall out of her pit before taking the robe and rubbing it all over her chest, soaking up its thin layer of perspiration. Dragging the goblin's robe farther up, she pulled it over to her left armpit and scrubbed it as hard as she could, and then did the same to the right armpit. Soon, her robe was saturated in odorous satyr sweat and stained with mud and who knows what else. Essa unballed the robe and began to admire her work, drawing her nose down to take a deep whiff of the funky aftermath. "Mmm... perfect."
1122.title: The Enchantress

choices: Citrine goes on a quest for revenge against the two!
Citrine brushes off her shame and gathers new ingredients.
11221.content:
Essa and Izzy danced all around the helpless Citrine, skipping and singing "Enchantment enchantment!" while rubbing their nasty B.O. on everything they could find that looked important to Citrine. Essa rubbed Citrine's shoes between her sweaty buttcrack while Izzy scrubbed her crotch with Citrine's extra pairs of underpants.

"Ooo, look at this!" Essa said, pulling out a gleaming ivory wand.

"Hey!" Citrine immediately started kicking and shouting, "That's my wand! Don't you dare use that!"

"Oooo, her wand!" Izzy said, "Best be careful with it!"

The two started prancing around, tossing her wand between them and waving it around in their best mock spellcaster way. Citrine nearly had a heart attack every time they threw it; she was certain that one of them would drop it on a rock and split it in two. Izzy caught it and sauntered over to Citrine and waved it in front of her. The goblin made a grab at it, but she quickly had her head stuffed in Essa's armpit and was subdued

"Hmm, this thing IS fun," Izzy said, "But I think I'm done with it. Oh! Wait, I've got one more thing to do!"

The satyr smirked an evil smirk, then stuffed the wide, blunt end of the wand into her musky belly button, her tongue lolling out in delight as she probed her belly button with it. When she pulled it out, it had a wad of sweaty fur and lint stuck to it.

"You want it again Essa?" She said.

"Yeah, actually seeing you use it I just got an idea!" Essa said. She grabbed the wand and stuck it in her ear, fishing out her smelly, nasty earwax. She pulled it out and it now had filth on both ends. She dropped it back into Citrine's bag, then threw it away. "Okay, let's finish her off!"

"Well, you were fun!" Said Izzy,

"You were real!" Said Essa

"But you weren't real fun!" The two said in unison, then spun around and put both their butts in Citrine's face. They didn't fart, or poop, but their asscrack sweat was so pungent that it quickly K.O'd her. She had a nasty nightmare about Satyr armpits, but when she came to she was back on the ground with her violated wand in her hand. It would still be serviceable, but to have her wand disrespected was a great dishonor.

And on top of that, all her stuff had been stolen! Everything but her clothing(Now "Enchanted" with satyr sweat.) was gone: Her food, her money and most of all her magic regeants! She had the fungus right beside her, but it was useless without everything else!
11221.title: Fully enchanted

choices: Start by finding where they go...
Go Unleash your magical rage onto them; Full Frontal Magical Beatdown!
112211.content:
Citrine will not stand for this!

She puts back on her now soiled garbs and plots retribution against the Satyrs....

But how will she do it?...
112211.title: Plan for Payback!

choices: Their Chieftess Appears before Citrine...
The Satyrs knock out Citrine and take her to their Village.
11222.content:
The satyrs then start fumbling with the rope that Citrine's trapped in and.... Let her go!?


Something is not right.... as one of them giggles mischieviously...
11222.title: Mercy! They let her go

choices: Make you dance uncontrollably!
Shrink you!
Turn you into a Rafflesia!(Permanently?!)
1123.content:
"Okay," Citrine said, turning the pages of her plant manuel, "it says here that Devil's toe only grows in spots where Rafflesia girls have danced and let their sweat drip onto the ground. It says in this part here that Rafflesia girls are sentient plant people, all "female" gender in appearance that dance constantly while expelling both nasty gas and sweat. And they believe that holding your nose is a great insult and will eat anyone who does it alive... Of course they do."

Citrine sighed, then tucked her supplies under a stump and took one last breath of fresh air before heading towards the glade she knew the fungus would be growing. She heard giggling coming from the meadow and rattling that almost sounded musical, along with, of course, a foul smell. Once she got close enough to see the Rafflesia, Citrine hid behind a tree to watch them and maybe get a feel for their behavior.

The Rafflesia girls from the waist up had normal humanoid torsos (except for having buds or blooming flowers on their chests) and a green hue to their skin. At their waist, their body was connected to a large red speckled flower that they either hopped around with or extended vines from to walk around. Right now about five or six of them were all dancing in a circle, some shaking home made maracas and others singing. In the middle of them was the object of Citrine's desire: the Devil's Toe fungus.

The little goblin girl tried to be stealthy, but the second she set foot in the glade all the dancing stopped and the Rafflesia immediately noticed her. Before Citirine could cry out, she was surrounded by the plant girls, who immediately turned around and started bumping her with their butts! Their slimy butts were covered in gross sweat that stunk like onions, and to make matters worse they were cutting farts that smelled like rotten broccoli!

"Ughhh wait a minute..." Citrine was woozy from the smells, but she was rememberig something, "Rafflesia farts are magical! They...
1123.title: Smelly dancer girls!

choices: She gets stuck in one of their butts!
A different, smellier monster scares them away and captures Citrine!
11232.content:
Citrine was shocked from the realization of what was happening, but she was powerless to stop it as she slowly but surely shrunk. The taunting, dancing, and of course farting Rafflesia started to tower over her as she shrunk further and further until she was a mere six inches tall!

Unfortunately for her, her clothing or supplies didn't shrink and so she was left naked standing in a pile of her own clothing! Citrine screamed and pulled a ribbon off her clothing to wrap around her as a makeshift dress, censoring her privates and tiny chest bumps.

While she was distracted The Rafflesia girls were plotting. They giggled then turned their butts around again only this time they didn't fart. They instead took times bouncing her bubbly butts on Citrine, smashing her with their smelly, awful tushies over and over again.

Citrine tried to flee, but she was trapped in their evil little circle and could only stand there getting pummeled with plant posteriors. Some of them even farted AGAIN on her, while they were smushing her and grinding on her with their stinking butts. Just when Citrine thought things couldn't get worse...
11232.title: Itty Bitty Citrine

choices: A high mountain cave that stunk of sulfur.
A hill cave that smelled and dripped with guano
A watery cave that dripped with stinky slime
113.content:
Why of course Citrine's goal was to make a powerful stinkmage's staff! What good is a mighty odor witch like herself without a proper stinkstaff? Citrine had already gotten it partially assembled, using a standard longstaff from the school's supply, imbuing it with skunk-oil gems she crafted herself, putting a used toilet plunger head on the end and dipping it in foul smelling devil brew to really empower it.

"Now all it needs," Citrine said, waving her stinking staff around, "Is a headpiece."

And the bulbous, spike-covered and most of all smelly "Devil's Toe Fungus" would fit the plunger holder and make the perfect tool to channel her stink magic through. With a staff like that, she'd be able to project smells directly into someone's nose, overfill toilets with nasty gunk or hex others with permastink curses. Needless to say, the young goblin wouldn't be a very nice Stinkmagus.

"First thing I'd do is go back to school and make everyone kiss my butt!" Citrine cackled, waving her stinkstaff around. "Then I'd fart on them until the whole school stunk like my butt!

The goblin spun around and fired a blast of stinking energy at a nearby bird. The poor avian caught wind of the intense stink of rotten eggs and quickly passed out. Citrine would've been proud of her magical stinks, but since her staff was missing a channeling head most of the spell hit her in the face and made her gag.

"Bah! The sooner I get that Devil's Toe Fungus the better!"

Citrine put on her backpack and stomped off. The fungus was known to grow in caves, and the nearest one was...
113.title: To become a Stinkmagus

choices: "Beat me in a farting contest!"
"Survive an hour of my farts!"
"Make me even smellier with your magic!"
1131.content:
"A mountain! Dangit!" Citrine stomped her foot and cut a little cheesy fart, "I hate PT... But I guess nothing good comes without breaking a little sweat. And I could practice my "Sweat amplification" spell on the way up..."

Citrine lifted her arms and pointed at her armpits, blasting them with a bit of her magic. They were already dripping with sweat from the powerful magic, stinking of onions and garlic. By the time she got up the mountain they'd be soaked through her robes and stinking like a landfill full of old pizza and rotten vegetables. Citrine smirked at the idea, put her staff in her backpack and started climbing the sheer rock of the mountain.

The further Citrine climbed, the more she started to smell something rotten. And it wasn't her armpits(Well, not just her armpits, anyway), it stunk like brimstone and sulfur, like something evil or... maybe?

"Nah, it couldn't be." Citrine laughed, "Dragons would never go this far north from their natural habitats..."

Grraaaaoooorrr.....

Her calm confidence when she heard that growling rumble. Citrine quickly resolved to climb the mountain as fast as she could, get the fungus and jump if she had to, rather than face a dragon. But when she got to the top, dripping with her own magically induced sweat, the dragon waiting for her wasn't quite what she was expecting.


It was a half-dragon! Standing eight feet easily, a few hundred pounds at least, and covered in scales save for her humanoid belly, breast and face, she looked down at the goblin and smiled.

"Hello there little one," She hissed, spewing more disgusting sulfur-scented breath on Citrine, "And just what are you doing here?"

Citrine sidled to the left, trying to get past the half-dragon to the inner cave where the fungus would be growing, "I just needed to- AH!"

She was hoisted up into the air by the half-dragon's tail and brought around to her giant, scaly butt.

"I think I asked you a question!" Said the half-dragon, then she grunted and-

FRRAAAAAART!

Blasted a huge, stinking fart right in Citrine's face! The little goblin choked and gagged on the awful stink. Dragon farts were the worst!

"Now answer," Growled the half-dragon again.

"I... I need fungus! There's a special fungus here that I need. In your cave!"

"Well too bad. Anything in this cave is mine. And it's gonna stay that way." The half-dragon said, farting again and blowing back Citrine's hair.

"Please! Anything! I'm so close!"

"Hmm...." The dragon tapped a claw on her chin, "Well maybe. I'll let you have it if you can..."
1131.title: Dragon farts? Oh no!

choices: Citrine goes after the fungus.
Citrine wants to now study DRAGON FART MAGIC!
11312.content:
Citrine gasped in terror at the suggestion. She was about to tell the dragon that she didn't want the fungus anymore and she'd happily go home and never disturb the mighty half-dragon ever again, but before she could she was tossed under the Dragon's scaly butt. She tried to scramble backwards, but the dragon grunted and blasted a titanic fart that was like being under a stinking hair-dryer the size of a car.

"I hope you're ready for the "Might" of a dragon!" Said the half dragon. She dropped with her full force, butt-first, onto Citrine, squashing her like a cartoon character, smushing her against the scaly, smelly, gassy lizard butt, "After an hour of this you're gonna wish I just breathed fire on you!"

She let out a giant, stinking fart that reeked of brimstone and sulfur, making Citrine cry out in sinus pain.

"What's wrong goblin? Didn't you say you'd do anything for this! Wonder if you'll survive this!"

She lifted her butt a bit and blew out a horrifically noxious, wet fart that covered poor Citrine in foul moisture. The dragon laughed out loud as she ripped farts of every size and smell over the course of a horrific hour. She let out one more, horribly rotten fart that stunk of meat and rotten eggs, then stood up.

"Well well well, still alive Goblin?" She looked down, Citrine was still breathing at least, "Ha! By the way, name's Roala. By surviving my stink you've earned the right to know my name. Whelp. Now go get your fungus before I change my mind..."
11312.title: The Trial of the Dragon

choices: It was tall, dark, and not under her control!
It was small, nasty and completely at her whim!
113121.content:
Citrine peeled herself off the cave's floor and got up out of the stinking crater that Roala the half-dragon's rotten, explosive flatulence had left on the rocky ground. Her entire body was saturated with the dragon's vile sulfur gas and her hair was sticking on end from the intensely moist and humid stink, but at the very least she had completed her trial.

Citrine walked through the dank cave, still wary of the growls and stomach churns that she could hear echoing throughout the cave. She didn't know where Roala was and she hoped she didn't find out. She just wanted to get the fungus and get out. It usually grew in between stalagmites around the stench of dragon flatulence (And Citrine could attest that the smell was thick in the air).

"It should be...AHA!" Citrine caught sight of the bulbous, glowing red fungus. Without a second's delay she ran over and picked the three healthiest stalks of the Devil's Toe Fungus and tossed them into her bag. She retraced her steps out the cave and scaled back down the cliff so she could find a suitable patch of dirt to work her ritual in.

The summoning called for a fire to bet lit in a circle of dried wolf toejam and into the fire needed to be thrown a wad of slug-girl buttslime, a vial of cat pee, and of course the devil's toe fungus. Citrine recited the magical incantation and in a foul-smelling puff of green flame, Citrine's demon familiar was summoned! It appeared before her and...
113121.title: Time to summon!

choices: By taking a dragon-crap bath!
By beating the dragon in a stink-off!
113122.content:
"Wait!" Citrine cried out, holding her hand out. She was covered from head to toe in dragon flatus, but she was suddenly very alive with an excited energy. Her eyes were surging with a flame of intense intellectual interest.

"Hmm?" Roala the Half-dragon turned about, her large tail wagging behind her, "What is it goblin whelp? Do you want me to gas you into a green smear?"

Citrine stood up and did a triumphantly confident pose, "Nay! After experiencing your nasty gas, I have come to the ultimately scientific conclusion that Dragon farts are the most powerful form of stink-magic! And since it is my quest to become the most powerful stink-mage in the world, I must master your special brand of stench. So I humbly ask you to show me how I can master it."

The tension in the air rose. In complete silence, aside from her own rumbling breath, Roala moved forward, crushing rocks between her clawed toes as she went. She wrapped around Citrine with her long scaled tail and breathed on her for an uncomfortably long time before...

"You? You want to master the power of my mighty gas? Well that's quite a proposition.... You know of course that there's only one way to gain the stink of a dragon..."

In all honesty, Citrine didn't know ANYTHING about dragon stink. Dragons were so powerful and elusive that studying them or their smell was next to impossible.

"Of-of course I do!" She lied. "I'll do anything!"

"Hmm... excellent. You're eager, but do you really have what it takes to attain my stench? The only way is..."
113122.title: Dovahfart!

choices: The Werebats are furious and they attack Citrine.
The Werebats take a liking to Citrine and want to have "fun" with her.
1132.content:
Apparently the Devil's Toe Fungus grew in caves...

As Citrine approached the cave it looked pretty dark in there and deep inside she heard faint squeaking noises so she took out a lantern and uses some fire magic on it to light it up and she enters the cave there are some glowing mushrooms throughout the cave but none that she need...

She should also be careful of where she steps, while she found the guano's stink to be arousing to her it was pretty deep in some places...

In the distance she heard some squeaking as well as talking, Citrine then realized that this cave isn't just a home for bats... Citrine peeks behind some stalagmites and saw some female werebats talking about pranks. Citrine would have to be careful, as she heard that werebats are said to be sadistic and unpredictable, but the fungus she's looking for is right next to the werebats.

Suddenly the werebats stopped talking, as if they knew someone was in here...
1132.title: Not just a cave for ordinary bats....

choices: Citrine fights back with her magic, but then get's stuck in the bat guano...
Citrine is quick to avoid the werebats and reach for the fungus...
11321.content: Citrine hear one of the werebats exclaim about an intruder. they were quick to sniff out Citrine and show that they do not welcome her by swooping down to attack her. "I don't have time for you, I'm here for the Devil Toe Fungus!" Citrine exclaimed.
11321.title: The Werebats are furious and they attack Citrine.

choices: The foul-smelling slime seems to come to life.
She is met with some zombie mermaids that smell of dead fish.
Citrine steps in what appears to be a giant cobweb.
1133.content:
After squishing her feet through mud, she happens upon a cave


There were pools of stagnant water, and yellow-green slime which stank of foot odor. Citrine was forced to swim through some of the stinky pools of water...

After a long trek though the shallow stagnant water using only a lantern to light her way through the dark, she saw the Devil's Toe fungus on a rocky bank

Just then when she was about to get the fungus...
1133.title: A watery cave that dripped with stinky slime

choices: ...a dismal swamp with foul-smelling mud reeking of swamp gas and decay...
...a graveyard with stinky corpses reeking of decaying flesh...
...a sewer reeking of sewage and other nasty stuff...
114.content:
If Citrine was going to take her "Stink Magic" further she should start by learning how to transform into the beast of eternal stench!


And where else to go and start at but...
114.title: Smelly transformation

choices: a  fartfish, to finnish the ritual
other
1141.content: where she finds the phallus noxia fungus, a magical relative of tne common stinkhorn, but there is still one more thing she needs for her transformation.
1141.title: ...a dismal swamp with foul-smelling mud reekin...

choices: The smell seems to have an effect on Citrine, making her swim into the mud.
Citrine uses a levitation spell to pick up the fungus and some of the mud...
11412.content:
According to the book she read, the fungus grew in foul-smelling swamp mud which she also needed. It did not take long for Citrine to find both of what she was looking for...

The smell of the mud bog is like an eldritch colony hatchery which made it perfect for her spell, however she knows that the swamp mud is deep in some places, she'll need to find a way to get to the fungus.
11412.title: Evil-Smelling mud

choices: Brave the deep mud!
Forget the mud for now and focus on the fungus.
114121.content: The stench seems to magically draw Citrine closer, causing her to go into the smelly mud...and once there, the magic wears off. But as it turns out, the mud holds an even greater stench than she expected! Perhaps the mud itself was all she needed...but in order to get the proper kind, she'd need to go to the deep spots. What will she do now?
114121.title: Suprise Mud Bath!

choices: The Fungus Objects! Moving on its own!
Something stirs within the fetid mud bog!
114122.content: Despite Citrine being blissed by the fetid smell, It was Obvious that the mud would be too deep to traverse through, so Citrine uses a levitation spell she learned to try and pick up the fungus as well as some of the stinky mud for research... but as she was about to do that...
114122.title: Citrine uses a levitation spell to pick up the ...

choices: ...Realizes that there's a Rafflesia next door she can work on for her studies.
...realizes that there are some Stapelias growing in the Academy Garden...
...packs up to take her leave to find and Study the Titan Arum...
12.content:
Citrine uses a ladder to look for an encyclopedia on flowers, she could only find 3 entries, the Rafflesia, the Amorphopallus with the Titan Arum being the popular of the species, and the Stapelia which is also known as the Carrion Flower...

Each of these smelly flowers has an odor akin to rotten meat...



Afterward reading on the flowers Citrine then...
12.title: Arum, Stapelia, and Rafflesia

choices: ...knocks over the Rafflesia! There will be punishment for this!
...falls into the giant flower!
121.content:
Of course - just next door is the lab used for botany classes. She rushes out of the classroom and over to the next. Opening the door, she takes a peek inside. Luckily the room is unoccupied at the moment. Citrine makes her way to the back of the room where the Rafflesia sits encased in glass on top of a podium. One of the school's most prized specimens, it was easily over 6 feet in diameter! All Citrine needs is a tiny piece of the flower; she didn't want to bother the faculty at lunchtime, and she was sure nobody would notice a bit missing anyway.

Citrine drags a ladder over to the podium and climbs to the top. She can't help but admire the enormous red flower. It's so beautiful, yet so potent...the perfect flower for a girl like her. Citrine opens a hatch in the glass casing, one hand holding tongs and the other covering her nose...but nothing could have prepared her for the noxious Rafflesia! The scent of decaying flesh reaches up to Citrine's nasal cavity like the tendrils of some elder god. Her eyes fill with tears and she doesn't dare open her mouth to cough. Unable to withstand the all-out assault on her senses, Citrine loses her balance and...
121.title: ...Realizes that there's a Rafflesia next d...

choices: Citrine managed to hide and waited long enough until the class was over...
Citrine then farts and is discovered...
Citrine had to use what she researched on smell magic to scare entire class out.
1212.content:
As Citrine slips up and fall into the giant smelly flower, she tries to regain her bearings, but just as she was about to get out of the flower she heard some voices entering the room. Citrine feared that she might get in trouble for tampering with the prized Rafflesia and she had to hide.

Fortunately, the Rafflesia she fell into was a big enough hiding place for her. Citrine sat well out of sight trying not to make a noise fearing that she would be spotted as class started in the lab...
1212.title: Smelly hiding place

choices: Citrine manages to get a piece of the Rafflesia and sneaks out.
One of the students still in the room sees Citrine, who thought it was good.
12123.content: Citrine did not have time to wait she couldn't wait for the class to finish. After waiting for a bit She used her "Smell Magic" on the Rafflesia's odor mixed with her own stench to materialize an enormous and terrifying manifestation of the pungent stench. The green stinky manifestion looked like a huge mutated warthog corpse that snarled and roared. The entire botany class gets scared and frightened and run out of the room, giving Citrine a chance to escape.
12123.title: Citrine had to use what she researched on smell...

choices: The Stapelia Mandragoras are furious and object against Citrine's actions
The smelly Mandragoras agree to let Citrine take them back to her studies...
Citrine tests her magic on the flowers on the spot...
122.content:
In a pang of consciousness, Citrine realised that some Carrion Flowers were popping around the gardens like weeds. The gardener was going to get rid of the flowers anyway, but she never got to it for some reason...


Suddenly, just as Citrine was about to take them back to her studies, the Carrion Flowers start moving on their own! These aren't just Carrion Flowers, they're Carrion Mandragoras!
122.title: Carrions in the Garden

choices: Eat in the Cafeteria like the other students.
Eat lunch alone and outside in the courtyard...
Eat lunch alone and outside at the Academy Garden.
13.content:
The young Goblin mage, Citrine decides to put her studies on hold... She takes out her lunch satchel and open it to see again she's having for lunch... Yummy! "Frog Nuggets" and "Toad Spawn" soup and a bottle of blackberry cider, her favourite She closes her lunch satchel and carries it as she leaves the empty classroom...

She let's off a few light and smelly farts as walks down the hallway...
13.title: Go to lunch, continue your research and studies...

choices: An orc mage apprentice appoaches Citrine.
A skunk comes up to Citrine, curious.
132.content: Not wanting to sicken her classmates in the cafeteria, Citrine heads to the Academy courtyard to enjoy her lunch. Citrine takes her lunch and climbs into a chair of a gazebo there to enjoy. Toad Spawn soup and Blackberry Cider, her favorite... but just as she was going to enjoy her lunch...
132.title: Lunch in the courtyard...

choices: Ok let make a whereskunk
Another spell
The skunk talk to her
1322.content:
Citrine look the skunk over and thinking it look cute, that when she smelled the stink the little creature was making since the wind decided to change and blow the skunk musk back to her nose.
"Well your stinky one. Hmmm....." she pulled one of her borrowed book that she found in the restrict section, she still didn't understand why she need to be pat down entering the place and exiting when she just slipped the book in to her bag like she did. She gave the skunk a little spawn soup as she look fit the spells she wanted.
"Here it is let see how to change a animal in to a werefur and bind it to you as a personal servant." She look at the skunk.
1322.title: A skunk comes up to Citrine, curious.

choices: Soft Brest of a female skunk
The package of a male skunk.
13221.content:
She worked fast to draw the circle as the skunk was not paying any attention to her.
"Now let see." She look at the spell as she spoke the incantation and made the signal in the air to complete the spell.
Few seconds later the whole area was covered in a horrible smelling mist that chocked Citrine making her kneel on the ground hard trying to catch her breath.
The skunk not knowing what was going on sprayed in reflexive out, the same way that she was kneeling down in. Citrine got a face full of skunk spray that burned her eyes.
When the air was able to sweep it away standing there was citrine new pet a whereskunk looking at her confused and scared.
"Come to me now pet I want you to clean my face." She said trying not to puke her half eaten lunch up. The skunk did as it was told and moved over and started licking it musk off her face quickly as it could. That when she felt some things she wasn't expecting to have to deal with pressing in to her.......
13221.title: Ok let make a whereskunk

choices: Citrine Rides the Wereskunk back to her studies.
Citrine Rides the Wereskunk to the academy cafeteria.
132211.content:
As Citrine is picked up by the wereskunk, she feels its soft bosom on her face, indicating that it's a female, both Citrine and the Wereskunk were both slightly embarrassed by Citrine realizing this, but it subsides...

"Wh-where to Mistress?" the Wereskunk asked...
132211.title: Skunkette

choices: The student-turned-skunk takes its annoyance out on Citrine for what she's doing
The student turned skunk needs her help turning back to normal.
13223.content: Just as Citrine was about to perform her magic on the skunk, much to her surprise the skunk start to speak in the human tongue. "Thanks for the soup." The skunk thanks her. Citrine steps back in shock observing that the skunk is able to speak like a human. Turns out the skunk is a fellow student that's studying transformation magic.
13223.title: The skunk talks to her.

choices: A smelly fungus that's needed for research...
A Smelly flower needed research...
A Young little Harpy child that's eyeing up on Citrine's lunch.
133.content:
Citrine goes to the Academy Garden...

She sits at a stone patio to enjoy her lunch, but as she began eating she smells something horrible and out of sheer luck she finds that it's something she could use for her "stink magic" research...


It's...
133.title: Lunch at the Academy Garden.

choices: Shares some of her lunch... and try to pet her even.
Don't give her any food and try to scare her off.
1333.content:
Citrine looks up in the sky to see a young child harpy about the same size as her. She had Dark brown feathers with Red-Orange hair with small pigtails, she wore an orange and brown two-piece dress that had a high neck collar, but also she was smelly enough for the thought of Dragon dung to be a welcoming gesture.

The little harpy looked at Citrine and her lunch and started to approach her...

Apparently Citrine had enough food for the entire week...

How would she react to the little harpy?
1333.title: Hungry Harpy

choices: The little Harpy obliges to come with Citrine for her studies after she asks...
The Harpy likes being petted but then the Harpy's mother then arrives...
13331.content: As the Harpy chick approached Citrine, Citrine smiled and offered the little harpy some of her "Toad Spawn" Soup, in which the harpy obliged. As she helps herself to the soup, Citrine gently pats the little harpy's back and...
13331.title: Taking a liking...

choices: Rottengut, the Hobgoblin Witchling and Citrine's friend.
The Dean of the magical academy.
Ariane, a famous mage of Gielinor.
14.content:
Suddenly Citrine hears a knock at the door, someone comes in



It was...
14.title: Someone wants to visit you...

choices: Citrine does something wonderful to impress the others. (despite the smell)
Citrine does something wonderful, until something goes wrong...
15.content: While Citrine was about to head to lunch, she noticed a commotion in one of the rooms. The Magicians are also throwing a cantrip party! The other magicians are taking turns impressing each other with their magic spells. They see Citrine and offers her to join them, see what she can do.
15.title: The Magic academy is also throwing a cantrip pa...

info.brief_description: A goblin mage works on a kind of magic called "Smell Magic" or "Stink magic"...
info.description:
A goblin girl who goes by name "Citrine" who's a Senior student at a powerful Magic Academy goes on a quest to research a kind of magic that she likes to call "Smell magic" or "Stink Magic" which is a kind of revolves around smell...

http://basher-the-basilisk.deviantart.com/art/Citrine-357891113

You control what foul-smelling fate that's in store for her...

NOTE: May contain loli



What this interactive CAN have:

Stink fetish (Especially)

Quicksand/Mud fetish

Farting

Animal poop (as long as it doesn't lead to scat porn)


What this interactive CANNOT have:

Loli Sex

Excess nudity

Coprophagia (Eating of feces)

Grim outcomes and endings (ex: the main character dying in the worst ways possible)

-------------

Important notes
This story involves Stink fetishes! . Expect a lot of fetish based on Stench including Fart Fetish! (As well as bit of quicksand, mud, and WAM (Wet and Messy) fetishes.)


Have fun.....
